Welcome to badgegen’s documentation!¶

CLI¶

usage: badgegen [-h] [--left-width [LEFT_WIDTH]] [--right-width [RIGHT_WIDTH]]
                [--left-text [LEFT_TEXT]] [--left-stroke [LEFT_STROKE]]
                [--left-fill [LEFT_FILL]]
                [--left-text-color [LEFT_TEXT_COLOR]]
                [--right-text [RIGHT_TEXT]] [--right-stroke [RIGHT_STROKE]]
                [--right-fill [RIGHT_FILL]]
                [--right-text-color [RIGHT_TEXT_COLOR]]
                [--filename [FILENAME]]

Named Arguments¶

--left-width

Width of the left cell, None if fit to text

--right-width

Width of the left cell, None if fit to text

--left-text

Text for the left cell. Can be python format string

Default: “test”

--left-stroke

Outline color for left cell.

Default: “#000000”

--left-fill

Fill color for left cell.

Default: “#000000”

--left-text-color

Text color for left cell.

Default: “#FFFFFF”

--right-text

Text for the right cell. Can be python format string

Default: “100%”

--right-stroke

Outline color for right cell.

Default: “#000000”

--right-fill

Fill color for right cell.

Default: “#FFFFFF”

--right-text-color

Text color for right cell.

Default: “#000000”

--filename

Filename for the badge.

Default: “badge.svg”

API Documentation¶

BadgeGeneration Module.

class badgegen.BadgeGenerator(left_width=None, right_width=None, left_text='test', right_text='100%', height=None, radius=5, left_stroke='#000000', left_fill='#000000', left_text_color='#FFFFFF', right_stroke='#000000', right_fill='#FFFFFF', right_text_color='#000000', font_size=16, filename='badge.svg')¶

Badge Generator.

left_rectangle(width=75.0, height=25.0, radius=5.0, stroke='#000000', fill='#000000')¶

“Creates a rectangle with rounded left corners.

Parameters

  • width (float) – width of the rectangle in pts. Default 75.0

  • height (float) – height of the rectangle in pts. Default 25.0

  • radius (float) – radius of rounded corners in pts. Default 5.0

  • stroke (str) – color of the rectangle outline. Default #000000

  • fill (str) – color of the rectangle fill. Default #FFFFFF.

right_rectangle(width=150.0, height=25.0, radius=5.0, corner=75.0, stroke='#000000', fill='#000000')¶

“Creates a rectangle with rounded right corners.

Parameters

  • width (float) – width of the rectangle in pts. Default 150.0

  • height (float) – height of the rectangle in pts. Default 25.0

  • radius (float) – radius of rounded corners in pts. Default 5.0

  • corner (float) – x-coordinate of the left corner in pts. Default 75.0

  • stroke (str) – color of the rectangle outline. Default #000000

  • fill (str) – color of the rectangle fill. Default #FFFFFF.

badgegen.points_to_pixels(pts)¶

Approximate the number of pixels if given pts.

Parameters

pts (float) – the measure in points to convert

Returns

number of pixels
